32.eng-name: Virtues of the Night of Qadr

hadiths.text: Narrated Aisha:With the start of the last ten days of Ramadan, the Prophet (ﷺ) used to tighten his waist belt (i.e. work hard) and used to pray all the night, and used to keep his family awake for the prayers

chapter.ara-name: باب الْعَمَلِ فِي الْعَشْرِ الأَوَاخِرِ مِنْ رَمَضَانَ
chapter.eng-name: Good deeds in the last ten days of Ramadan.
